name: phicld

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wcel(cfv(cphi, c0), cn), wcel(c0, cn))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(cphi, c0), cn))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cn))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cfv(cphi, c0), cn))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(cphi, c0), cn))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cn))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cfv(cphi, c0), cn))

|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(cphi, c0), cn))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cn))

comment: Closure for the value of the Euler ` phi ` function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2016.)
